definitions.text: the act of installing something (as equipment)
examples: the telephone installation took only a few minutes

definitions.text: a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry
examples: the assembly plant is an enormous facility

definitions.text: a formal entry into an organization or position or office
examples: he was ordered to report for induction into the army
he gave a speech as part of his installation into the hall of fame
